mapper.select: SELECT MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PASS , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_AGE , MEM_TEL1 , MEM_TEL2 , MEM_GENDER , MEM_ADDR , IS_ADMIN , MEM_IMAGE FROM MEM_INFO WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail}
SELECT RESUME_NUM , RESUME_NAME FROM MEM_RESUME WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail}

SELECT RESUME_NUM , RESUME_NAME , RESUME_DATE , EDU_GRADE , EDU_SCHOOL , EDU_LOC , EDU_TYPE , EDU_MAJOR , EDU_BEGIN_DATE , EDU_END_DATE , EDU_IS_OVER , EDU_SCORE , HOPE_TYPE , HOPE_SAL , HOPE_LOC , HOPE_TIME FROM MEM_RESUME WHERE RESUME_NUM = #{resumeNum}
SELECT LIC_NUM , LIC_NAME , LIC_LOC , LIC_GRADE , LIC_DATE FROM LICENSE WHERE RESUME_NUM = #{resumeNum} ORDER BY LIC_NUM
SELECT PRO_NUM , PRO_TITLE , PRO_CONTENT FROM PROFILES WHERE RESUME_NUM = #{resumeNum} ORDER BY PRO_NUM
SELECT CAR_NUM , CAR_COMPANY , CAR_CAREER , CAR_TYPE , CAR_POSITION FROM CAREER WHERE RESUME_NUM = #{resumeNum} ORDER BY CAR_NUM

SELECT LIKE_RECRUIT_NUM , L.ANNOUNCE_NUM , MEM_EMAIL , ANNOUNCE_TITLE , UPTO_HIREDATE , WORK_TYPE , CAREER , ACADEMIC_BACKGROUND , AREA , RECRUIT_VIEWS , COM_NUM FROM LIKE_RECRUIT L, RECRUIT_LIST R WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail} AND L.ANNOUNCE_NUM = R.ANNOUNCE_NUM ORDER BY ANNOUNCE_NUM
SELECT LIKE_NUM , C.COM_NUM , C.COM_NAME , C.COM_LOC , C.COM_TYPE , C.COM_EMAIL , C.COM_TEL , MEM_EMAIL FROM LIKE_COMPANY L, COMPANY_INFO C WHERE L.COM_NUM = C.COM_NUM AND MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail}
